title: Corrie's Daniel returns to empty bedroom after Sinead's death in emotional scene
text:

Coronation Street aired moving scenes in the wake of Sinead Tinker's tragic death, as reality hit her husband Daniel Osbourne.

He returned to their home for the first time since her death, walking into the bedroom she died in while he was holding their baby son Bertie.

Daniel stared at the now empty bed, hours on from her passing away in the very spot - and it visibly dawned on him that his wife had left them.

After promising to do his best not to fall apart for their son's sake, he fought back tears as he prepared for little Bertie's bath time - trying to keep things as normal as possible.

(Image: ITV)

He laid him on the bed, sweetly asking the baby if he wanted bubbles in the bath before praising Bertie's late mother.

Daniel said he would "try his best", but wouldn't be as good as his mother Sinead, keeping her memory alive - facing his fears after telling Sinead he was scared of bathing their son because of the "dangers", with her encouraging him to get over it.

Sinead had feared her son would never remember her, with him being so young when she died.

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

But Daniel vowed to make sure he knew who she was, and how much she loved him.

After her devastating death, Daniel took Bertie for a walk around the Cobbles as his distressed family looked on.

As they gathered together in their shared grief, Daniel returned home in the dark for the first time since Sinead's body was taken away.

(Image: ITV)

Viewers were moved to tears by the moment he walked in to the quiet flat, with Sinead gone forever.

Taking to Twitter , one fan said: " Well #Corrie has destroyed me beyond belief. Daniel talking to the baby at the end.... physically hurt."

Another tweeted: "That was so beautiful. Bless Daniel talking to Bertie at the end."

A third commented: " #Corrie this was done beautifully. Loved the bit at the end where Daniel was going to bath Bertie. It was so sweet. Its never easy losing your loved ones whether you're expecting it or not."

Coronation Street airs Mondays, Wednesdays and Fridays at 7:30pm and 8:30pm on ITV.
description: Coronation Street fans were in tears as Daniel Osbourne began life without wife Sinead, after she lost her battle with cancer
